entry.title: Using Friction As A Feature In Machine Learning Algorithms
entry.summary: Friction often has a negative connotation in user experience design, but it actually has many benefits. Its best-known use case is mitigating unintended consequences in high-risk scenarios, yet it has a new place in the age of artificial intelligence.
